title: [搬运]Technic Pack Cracked 科技时代2013破解版
author: stevenchenmy
txt_content:
本帖最后由 stevenchenmy 于 2013-5-15 08:58 编辑 
注意！！本MOD只支持英文！！而且很多专业术语！使用前请三思！！
官网：http://www.technicpack.net
出处连接：http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kw3R3xrc34s   （原作者的连接实在是找不到了，如果有谁找到请回帖告诉我）

官网介绍原文：
Welcome to the PlatformThe revolutionary Technic Platform is here and with it you will be able to put together a collection of hand-picked mods, maps, configs, texture packs, or total-conversion packages and share them with anyone you’d like, easily and quickly using the next-generation Technic Launcher. Maintain version numbers, force updates, send out custom texture packs, it’s all possible.From massive custom server operators to a small group of friends on a private server, mod makers and map producers, The Platform allows you to get busy playing modded Minecraft with minimal hassle and enjoy the rich content the modding community has made available to it’s players.
包含著名Mod包：
Tekkit
TekkitLite
TekkitClassic
Big Dig
Voltz
Hack/Mine

本mod非完全破解，需要使用mojang账号登陆（但不需要购买所以还是免费的）。附上注册链接。
下载地址请猛戳
写给服主的话：
想要开服的话，请在各自Mod包页面里寻找下载连接
